languages.text: "Ах, шерин! Может, постранствую с тобой — и обо мне напишут? Хочу роман! О похождениях бесстрашной Джай Хейдари, что мастерски облагораживает пулей лик любого ашмага, вставшего на ее пути!" {n}Джай мечтательно поправляет локон.{/n}

"Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

"Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

languages.text: ¡Ah, shereen! ¿Puede que, si viajo con usted, también escriban sobre mí? ¡Quiero una novela sobre mí! Que trate de las aventuras de la intrépida Jae Heydari, ¡capaz de matar de un disparo a cualquier ashmag que se interponga en su camino!». {n}Jae juega con un mechón de su pelo con una expresión pensativa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: ¡Ah, shereen! ¿Puede que, si viajo con usted, también escriban sobre mí? ¡Quiero una novela sobre mí! Que trate de las aventuras de la intrépida Jae Heydari, ¡capaz de matar de un disparo a cualquier ashmag que se interponga en su camino!». {n}Jae juega con un mechón de su pelo con una expresión pensativa.{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ、シェリーン！もしかして、私も一緒に旅をすれば、私のことも書いてもらえるのですか？小説がいいです！大胆不敵なジェイ・ヘイダリの冒険についての！邪魔するクソどもには弾丸をくらわせる、ジェイ・ヘイダリについての物語です！」{n}ジェイは髪の束をもてあそび、切なげな表情を浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、シャリーン！もしかして、私も一緒に旅をすれば、私のことも書いてもらえるのですか？小説がいいです！大胆不敵なジェイ・ヘイダリの冒険についての！邪魔するクソどもには弾丸をくらわせる、ジェイ・ヘイダリについての物語です！」{n}ジェイは髪の束をもてあそび、切なげな表情を浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: “啊，亲爱的！既然我和你一起旅行，他们会不会也写我的故事？要是能有人写本关于我的小说就好了！关于婕伊·海达利和她无畏的大冒险！要是有哪个坏种敢拦住她的去路，她会优雅地赏他一颗子弹！”{n}婕伊打趣道，脸上挂着一缕头发，看起来跃跃欲试。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊，亲爱的！既然我和你一起旅行，他们会不会也写我的故事？要是能有人写本关于我的小说就好了！关于婕伊·海达利和她无畏的大冒险！要是有哪个坏种敢拦住她的去路，她会优雅地赏他一颗子弹！”{n}婕伊打趣道，脸上挂着一缕头发，看起来跃跃欲试。{/n}

languages.text: "Ah, Shereen! Vielleicht werde ich mit Euch reisen und sie werden auch über mich schreiben? Ich will einen Roman! Über die Abenteuer der furchtlosen Jae Heydari, die jeden Ashmag, der ihr im Weg steht, mit dem Kuss einer Kugel bedenkt!" {n}Jae spielt mit wehmütiger Miene mit einer Locke ihres Haars.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Shereen! Vielleicht werde ich mit Euch reisen und sie werden auch über mich schreiben? Ich will einen Roman! Über die Abenteuer der furchtlosen Jae Heydari, die jeden Ashmag, der ihr im Weg steht, mit dem Kuss einer Kugel bedenkt!" {n}Jae spielt mit wehmütiger Miene mit einer Locke ihres Haars.{/n}

languages.text: « Ah, shereen ! Peut-être que si je voyage à vos côtés, on écrira aussi des histoires à mon sujet ? Un roman, même ! Les aventures de l'intrépide Jae Heydari, qui a criblé de balles tous les ashmags qui ont eu l'audace de se mettre en travers de son chemin ! » {n}Perdue dans ses pensées, Jae tripote une mèche de ses cheveux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ah, shereen ! Peut-être que si je voyage à vos côtés, on écrira aussi des histoires à mon sujet ? Un roman, même ! Les aventures de l'intrépide Jae Heydari, qui a criblé de balles tous les ashmags qui ont eu l'audace de se mettre en travers de son chemin ! » {n}Perdue dans ses pensées, Jae tripote une mèche de ses cheveux.{/n}

languages.text: "Şirinim, seninle yolculuğa çıkarsam belki benim hakkımda da bir şeyler yazarlar. Korku bilmez Jae Heydari'nin maceraları. O ki yoluna çıkan tüm külboğazlara mermilerin öpücüğünü ustalıkla kondurandır!" {n}Jae, saçının bir tutamıyla oynamaya dalıyor. Yüzünde dalgın bir ifade var.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen! Perhaps I'll travel with you and they'll write about me as well? I want a novel! About the adventures of the fearless Jae Heydari, who skilfully bestows a bullet's kiss on any ashmag who stands in her way!" {n}Jae toys with a lock of hair, a wistful expression on her face.{/n}
